Sentencas: Nano-crystalline RETiNbO6 (RE = Ce, Pr, Nd and Sm) is successfully synthesized through the solution combustion technique.
Titulo: Electrical and optical properties of nanocrystalline RE-Ti-Nb-O6 (RE = Ce, Pr, Nd and Sm) electronic material

Sentencas: The XRD analysis revealed that the materials have orthorhombic aeschynite structure with space group Pnma.
Titulo: Electrical and optical properties of nanocrystalline RE-Ti-Nb-O6 (RE = Ce, Pr, Nd and Sm) electronic material

Sentencas: The particle size determined from XRD and TEM shows that the samples are nano-crystalline.
Titulo: Electrical and optical properties of nanocrystalline RE-Ti-Nb-O6 (RE = Ce, Pr, Nd and Sm) electronic material

Sentencas: Structure is confirmed by the analysis of FT-Raman, the fourier transform infrared spectra and surface morphology by SEM micrograph.
Titulo: Electrical and optical properties of nanocrystalline RE-Ti-Nb-O6 (RE = Ce, Pr, Nd and Sm) electronic material

Sentencas: The optical properties, dielectric characteristics at radio frequency range and complex impedance of the system are also studied.
Titulo: Electrical and optical properties of nanocrystalline RE-Ti-Nb-O6 (RE = Ce, Pr, Nd and Sm) electronic material

Sentencas: Percentage of rare earth in each compound, sintering temperature and density achieved are calculated.
Titulo: Electrical and optical properties of nanocrystalline RE-Ti-Nb-O6 (RE = Ce, Pr, Nd and Sm) electronic material

Sentencas: The UV-Vis spectra show that the materials can be used as a protective material from UV radiation due to high absorbance in that region.
Titulo: Electrical and optical properties of nanocrystalline RE-Ti-Nb-O6 (RE = Ce, Pr, Nd and Sm) electronic material

Sentencas: These compounds show strong emission in violet and green regions in the photoluminescence spectrum.
Titulo: Electrical and optical properties of nanocrystalline RE-Ti-Nb-O6 (RE = Ce, Pr, Nd and Sm) electronic material

Sentencas: The compounds are useful in communication systems due to low dielectric loss and high dielectric constant.
Titulo: Electrical and optical properties of nanocrystalline RE-Ti-Nb-O6 (RE = Ce, Pr, Nd and Sm) electronic material

Sentencas: The high ionic conductivity suggests that the material can be used as electrolyte in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Electrical and optical properties of nanocrystalline RE-Ti-Nb-O6 (RE = Ce, Pr, Nd and Sm) electronic material
